articles.title: Suspect in 2017 Omaha shooting death is arrested in Missouri

articles.description: Exceptions would be allowed if the woman was deemed dangerous or a substantial flight risk.

articles.title: Missouri Legislature moves to unshackle pregnant prisoners
articles.description: JEFFERSON CITY, Mo. (AP) — The Missouri Senate has given initial approval to a bill that prohibits pregnant prisoners from being restrained while giving birth.
